question: 1) Energy – Multiple Choice Scientists at SLAC [slack] are using the Linac [LIH-nak] Coherent Light Source to study protein crystal structures. Which of the following best describes a main challenge to this approach? W) Protein crystallography [crystal-AW-graphy] is low-resolution X) Protein crystallography cannot study ligand [LIH-gund]binding Y) Some proteins crystallize into structures too large to study Z) Some proteins cannot be crystallized
answer:
Z) SOME PROTEINS CANNOT BE CRYSTALLIZED
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
